SocketHandler Class Reference

A listener class that will be called by SocketBase to parse and utilize messages over a socket. More...

Detailed Description

A listener class that will be called by SocketBase to parse and utilize messages over a socket.

Take a message and do whatever functionality this handler implements from simply displaying message to.

Parameters:
type - What type (i.e. text, xml, ) of message is this message.
channel - What channel (i.e. verbose, progress, etc.) is this message.
msg - Data to be parsed out
